Name: Clear Halo
Description: After 10s of not being damaged, generate a SHIELD for 10% of Max Health over 2s.
Location: This ring can be found at the end of the final room in the Athenaeum Wek. After entering the final room, take the right elevator to the second floor and jump the gap.Take the furthest lit tile down a slight ways to pick up the House Wek Command Orb.Climb the room until you reach the top, then put the orb into the pedestal to the right of the terminal.Upon killing the boss and collecting the Insulator, go to the right from the terminal and go down the walkway and the Clear Halo will be on a pedestal.
